sources.title: Sensation Seekers
sources.description: A free-spirited flapper falls in love with a staid minister, but fear of ruining his reputation causes her to marry another man.

metadata.Plot: Ray Sturgis, leader of the fashionable Long Island jazz set, is engaged to "Egypt" Hagen, an up-to-date girl in every respect. Egypt is arrested at a roadhouse raid, and at her mother's bidding, the Reverend Norman Lodge arranges ...
metadata.Actors: Billie Dove, Huntley Gordon, Raymond Bloomer
